metadata.name: Potential Arbitrary File Download Using Office Application
metadata.comment: Detects potential arbitrary file download using a Microsoft Office application

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\excel.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powerpnt.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\winword.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('excel\.exe', 'powerpnt\.exe', 'winword\.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('https://'))))

output.summary: Detects potential arbitrary file download using a Microsoft Office application
